recipesJson.name: Cozy by the Fire
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description: Made for Week 45 of the Year of Mixing. A balanced cafe mocha with hints or caramel.

reviews.text: The coffee does something wonderful to the chocolates in this recipe and brings them closer to the realm of realistic.  This is a stout and creamy cup of mocha with the caramel mostly just sweetening the mix a bit and helping to pull the coffee and chocolate notes together.   It is strong without tasting burnt.  My husband tasted more of a hot cocoa with hints of coffee and I was the opposite, but we both agreed it was delicious lol.
